product_meta.title: Conair Round Shaped Double-Sided Wall Mount Lighted Makeup Mirror; 1x/8x magnification; Oiled Bronze Finish
product_meta.description: Reflect your good taste with mirrors by CONAIR, with eye-catching finishes and styles that will improve the view in any room. Wherever you put CONAIR mirrors, you will like what you see! The Conair Illuminations Wall Mount Lighted Mirror features fog-free viewing, 1x magnification for true viewing, and 8x magnification for flawless makeup application. It easily mounts to the wall and extends up to 13 inches and rotates 360 degrees for comfortable use anywhere. The oil-rubbed finish goes beautifully with any decor.
